item.description:
Come gather for some Holiday Cheer and Beer! as we make our way through Harvard Square by candle light. Battery operated tea candles will be available (voluntary contribution $1 or less). You may wish bring your own candle in a lantern to light our way.

PARKING is unrestricted in Cambridge on SUNDAYS

DRESS:LADDIES DRESS IN CAPS, SCARVES & MITTENS/ LASSIES DRESS IN HAT, SHAWL & MITTENS


5:00 GRENDEL'S DEN 89 Winthrop Street for Half Price Appetizers with a drink purchase. This place is located downstairs(Below "Upstairs on the Square". They have wonderful hot cider with spiced rum and a variety of food items ranging from burgers to salads. You may check the menu here.


6:00 Candle Light Walk through Harvard Yard to John Harvard's Brew House ...spontaneous caroling may occur, however this is not a requirement. This is our photo opp stop.

6:30 JOHN HARVARD'S BREW HOUSE 33 Dunster Street ...Order Beer by the pitcher..or by the glass.

7:30 TOMMY DOYLE'S 2nd floor 96 Winthrop Street Warm up with more Cheer. Tommy Doyle's has come out with "New England Winter Drinks" such as Hot Toddy, Peppermint paddy Hot Chocolate, Russian Stoli Vanilla Hot Chocolate, West Cork Hot Cider, and Nutty Irish Coffee. Appetizers are half priced with any drink purchase (mention you are with our group when ordering).

HOW TO FIND ME: You can find me by the LED lights on my reindeer antlers, black cloak.
item.name: Holiday Pub Crawl in Harvard Square
